displayName.text: Arnold L Weg, MD and Russell A Weg, MD

formattedAddress: 710 Park Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Arnold L Weg, MD and Russell A Weg, MD

adrFormatAddress: 710 Park Ave, New York, NY 10021-4944, USA

originalText.text:
Dr Arnold Weg is compassionate and patient and worth the wait. He cares for my elderly mother. His staff however do not represent him well. They are rude, hang up abruptly and while you are in mid sentence and consistently put calls on hold for long stretches. The assistance from the staff is a total disconnect from Dr Weg's approach and would be very concerning in an emergency situation.
The doctor deserves more stars, but his staff detracts from the care experience.
Dr Weg, please do something about your staff. Please read the reviews. The comments about them are consistently poor.

originalText.text: Dr Weg is an amazing Dr.   Dr's nowadays don't spend the time to go over your patient history and just chat with you or ask your background and what you do. He genuinely cares. He makes it seem like he knows exactly who you are, even though I see him once every year (And I am sure he has hundreds of patients, if not thousands)  The front staff can use a little bit attitude adjustments and actually act like they care. But, this does not speak to his bed sides manner and his ability to do his work. Great!

originalText.text: Excellent Doctor.  He is absolutely great always treats his patients with care.  Compassionate.  I would highly recommend him.  He is truly a 10 star rating.   From .Me. Mrs. Estrella
